name: Collagen Health Starter Discovery Set
about: What it is:A trio of bestselling, skin-loving formulas that effectively cleanse, exfoliate, and moisturize for a balanced and glowing complexion..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dryness.Highlighted Ingredients:- GLA: Visibly smooths, softens, and nourishes the skin..What Else You Need to Know:Enhance your routine in three easy steps with this discovery set of these tried-and-true favorites. Hydrate for glowing, softer-, and younger-looking skin with ELEMISu2019s most celebrated products that are loved around the world for their unique textures, spa-inspired aromatics, and unmatched efficacy..This Set Contains:- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Pro-Collagen Marine Cream

Phenoxyethanol, Betaine, Sodium Hydroxide, Propylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Benzoic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Dehydroacetic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Papain, Saponins, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Step one: Cleanse with the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm to easily remove makeup and daily grime. .-Step two: Exfoliate with the Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads and see smoother, more radiant skin in just one swipe..-Step three: Moisturize with Pro-Collagen Marine Cream to boost hydration and improve firmness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Collagen Health Starter Discovery Set by Elemis, and I must say, it has been a game-changer for my skincare routine. As someone with combination skin, I often struggle to find products that balance hydration without making my skin too oily or dry. This set exceeded my expectations in every way. The Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm effortlessly melts away makeup and impurities, leaving my skin feeling clean and nourished. The Pro-Collagen Marine Cream is lightweight yet incredibly hydrating, making my skin look plump and radiant. Finally, the Pro-Collagen Eye Renewal has visibly reduced the fine lines around my eyes, giving me a more youthful appearance. Overall, this discovery set is a perfect introduction to Elemis's collagen-boosting products, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their skincare regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Elemis Collagen Kit is a standout skincare regimen that offers simplicity and effectiveness in one package. From the first use, I found the kit incredibly easy to incorporate into my daily routine. The instructions were straightforward, and the products themselves were user-friendly, making the entire experience hassle-free.  One of the most notable benefits of the Elemis Collagen Kit is how it kept my skin clear and radiant. After just a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a visible reduction in fine lines and an overall improvement in my skin's texture. The collagen-rich formulas seemed to work wonders, leaving my skin looking and feeling rejuvenated.  The scent of the products is another delightful aspect. Each item in the kit has a light, refreshing fragrance that adds a touch of luxury to the skincare routine without being overpowering. It's a pleasant, soothing scent that makes using the products feel like a mini spa experience at home.  Overall, the Elemis Collagen Kit combines ease of use, efficacy, and a delightful sensory experience, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking to improve their skincare regimen with minimal effort. My skin has never felt better, and I highly recommend this kit to others.

Overall, the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Set is a must-try for anyone looking to simplify their skincare routine while still getting results.

reviews.review_text: This set includes the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm, Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads, and Pro-Collagen Marine Cream each formulated to cleanse, exfoliate, and moisturize. My skin type is combination and dry, and this trio has addressed my concerns of fine lines, wrinkles, and occasional dryness exceptionally well. The Cleansing Balm effortlessly removes makeup and impurities, while the Resurfacing Facial Pads gently exfoliate, revealing a brighter complexion. The Pro-Collagen Marine Cream provides intense hydration, making my skin softer and smoother. Overall, this set has made my skincare routine more efficient and enjoyable, delivering a balanced and glowing complexion. This all-in-one kit from Elemis is the perfect introduction packed with three of their bestselling formulas with its effective yet gentle approach to all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Discovery Set for a week now, and I am genuinely very pleased with the results. Having tried quite a good deal of skincare products myself, I felt confidently sure of saying that this set outclasses. Well, first of all, the packaging is simply gorgeous and luxe to the feel. That already lends the impression this will be some really good quality. The sizes of each item within this set are pretty good, so it's perfect to see if you like the range before committing to full-size versions. This cleansing balm is really a game-changer: it makes quick work of removing makeup and cleanses my skin, leaving it so soft and nourished. Pro-Collagen Marine Cream is light but deeply nourishing. After using it, I already see an improvement in the texture and the firmness of my skin. I also love Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads. They are so gentle yet very efficient in cleaning the skin, leaving it smooth and radiant.   One thing I have become most grateful for is how soon it was that I could find a difference. My skin felt more hydrated, plump, and luminous. I got several compliments regarding my complexion since I started using these products. The only downside would be with the price point, but considering the results and the quality of ingredients, to me, it's well worth an investment. Generally, I do really highly recommend Elemis Collagen Health Starter Discovery Set to anyone who seeks more than an average skincare routine.

The other aspect is the value for money and ratio of products youu2019ll get. I think youu2019ll run out of the pads first, then the moisturizer, then the cleansing balm. I donu2019t know that they really thought through how much to include based on when youu2019ll run out of each thing. Also for how much you get this is really expensive. reviews.review_title: Honestly, wish there was a different cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Elemis Pro-Collagen Discovery Kit and overall, Iu2019m impressed with the results. Here are my thoughts on each product:  Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm: While effective, I find it a bit too heavy for daily use unless youu2019re removing makeup or sunscreen. It leaves a residue that makes me feel like I need a second cleanse, which isnu2019t ideal for everyday routines. I would have preferred a lighter cleanser in the kit.  Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads: These are the standout item for me. They effectively remove dirt and impurities that my regular cleanser misses. My skin feels cleaner and Iu2019ve noticed less dryness and more smoothness. However, clearer instructions and larger print on the packaging would be helpful.  Pro-Collagen Marine Cream: It provides excellent hydration and has noticeably improved my skinu2019s texture. Iu2019m not a fan of the scent, but the results make it worth it.  Since using these products, Iu2019ve experienced some breakouts, which might be part of the skin purging process, though this is debatable. Despite this, my skin feels more moisturized and smoother overall.  In summary, Iu2019d give this kit 4.5 stars if I could. I donu2019t necessarily love the scent of it as much as I like the scent of the other two, but I can overlook it because it is extremely heavily moisturizing, which is perfect for when youu2019re traveling and going from climate to climate, and your skin reacts differently. My skin tends to get dry and kind of crusty when I travel so this is perfect All in all, I would definitely recommend buying this product. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Discovery Set, and it's a game changer for my skincare routine. This trio includes the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm, Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads, and Pro-Collagen Marine Cream, and together they provide a comprehensive approach to cleansing, exfoliating, and moisturizing.  Starting with the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm, I was impressed by how effectively it removed makeup and impurities while leaving my skin feeling soft and nourished. It has a lovely texture and a spa-like scent that makes the cleansing process feel luxurious.  Next, the Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads are a revelation. With just one swipe, my skin feels smoother and more radiant. These pads are gentle yet effective, making them perfect for daily use without irritation. I noticed an improvement in my skinu2019s texture almost immediately.  The final step, the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream, is an absolute delight. This moisturizer is lightweight yet deeply hydrating, and it absorbs beautifully. My skin feels firmer and looks more youthful with regular use. The GLA in these products visibly smooths and softens my skin, addressing my concerns about fine lines and dryness.  Overall, the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Discovery Set is an excellent introduction to high-quality skincare. It leaves my complexion balanced, glowing, and youthful. Highly recommended for anyone looking to elevate their skincare routine!

reviews.review_text: I wanna start with the presentation of this set. It is gift worthy for sure! Everything is neatly placed in the box and you can open it like a book to reveal the products inside. Lastly, the pro collagen marine cream has a gel cream consistency and helps absorb quickly into the skin. It really hydrates your skin in this beautiful balanced way. I find that these products smell like a spa experience. My skin is left feeling perfect. I would incorporate each piece into my routine at different stages. I prefer to use the cleansing balm in the evening and use the facial pads during the day. I would use the marine cream as a day cream since it is meant for that, but you can easily use it for both day and night. Overall, I think that these products are gentle enough to give to anyone and that they would enjoy them and probably purchase the full-size versions themselves.

reviews.review_text: I've incorporated the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Set into both my daily and nightly routine. Using the set together, it creates a cohesive skincare regimen. Once I cleanse my face in the morning, I go in with the marine cream for hydration. Then at night, I cleanse again using the cleansing balm and finish that off with the facial pads.   Short-term, my skin feels hydrated and radiant. However, once I completed this routine for a few days, my skin appears firmer and smoother. The products are user-friendly and integrate seamlessly into my routine and they can in yours as well!

reviews.review_title: Nice little spa day at home (me time!!)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After the worst week imaginable, finding the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Set in my mailbox felt like a sign to treat myself to a full spa day at home. I started with their cleansing balm, which effortlessly removed all my makeup without making my contacts greasyu2014a huge plus. Using a warm cloth to remove it and steaming my face afterwards was incredibly soothing. The resurfacing pads provided a gentle yet effective exfoliation, leaving my skin feeling fresh and rejuvenated. I finished with the pro-collagen cream, which deeply moisturized my skin without any greasiness. This was my first time using Elemis products, and I achieved the special spa day (without the heavy price) from the comfort of my own home. The cleansing balm stands out as my favorite from the set and I will definitely be buying the large size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect discovery set for the Elemis powerhouse products. The Collagen cleansing balm is my favorite oil based cleanser. Apply to dry skin to break down makeup and sunscreen, the wet your hands and lightly rub your face to emulsify. I use a wet microfiber cloth to then wash it away. Itu2019s one of the only cleansers that doesnu2019t leave my face feeling stripped and tight. Then I use the lactic acid exfoliation pads. Lactic acid is so great for minimizing texture and removing dead skin. These do a great job without causing irritation to my sensitive skin. Iu2019ll definitely get more of these. Then you use the moisturizer- itu2019s not super heavy but provides good hydration for daytime without being greasy. I will sometimes use a thicker cream at night but thatu2019s because I am so dry. During daytime, I then finish up with spf and Iu2019m ready for makeup. The pads provide a nice smooth canvas.

reviews.review_text: This set is perfect for testing out the products or for travel! The cleansing balm is a soft buttery texture that effectively glides on the skin and removes makeup. reviews.review_title: Solid kit that covers all of the bases
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this set. The cleansing balm was a good texture that I found to not only be effective in removing makeup (I followed up with a foam cleanser, as is my standard) but that it also left my skin feeling very soft after use. The smell was not my favorite but it wasnu2019t too lingering. I do not like products in pots that do not come with the necessary tools to get them out so half a star for that.   I really liked the exfoliating pads and would purchase again. They were great for using as the u201ctoneu201d step of my skincare and left my skin feeling extremely soft and smooth immediately after use. I was worried these might make me breakout but I used them once a day and had no adverse reaction.   The moisturizer is solid. It likely wonu2019t replace my current moisturizer in my daily routine but I found it to be effective at hydrating my skin. It also worked well under makeup.   Overall I liked and would recommend these products.

From cleansing to moisturizing, this kit has it all covered! The products feel so luxurious on my skin and the smell is anbsolutely amazing too. After using it for a few weeks, Iu2019ve noticed a major improvement in both my skinu2019s texture and glow. If youu2019re looking to step up your skincare game, definitely give this kit a try!

The cleansing balm worked really well at getting my makeup off and just cleaning my face without making a mess. Im not sure how I feel about the resurfacing pads. They felt slightly abrasive although they didn't make my skin break out or anything like that. I've also never used a product like that before so that may be why I'm not sure how I feel. The moisturizer was amazing. I absolutely loved the smell of it and it left my skin feeling really hydrated. If I was going to purchase anything it would definitely be that. Overall though I'm really glad I got to try these products and I felt it made my skin look more supple and radiant.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using these products for the past few weeks and I am loving my results! Love this set and will be recommending to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time ever trying anything from Elemis so I loved being able to try different products they offer. This brand is definitely on the pricier side and the products really give the luxury vibe. I truly love each of these products. The cleansing balm does a great job of taking off all my makeup without stripping my skin and leaving it dehydrated. It has  minty feel to it leaving my skin nice and cool. The resurfacing pads I have used for about a week and I love that they are gentle enough to use everyday without irritating my skin while also removing all of the leftover dirt and grime my cleanser didnu2019t get. My overall favorite product from the kit was the marine cream. It is incredibly hydrating and applies well. It isnu2019t heavy on my skin and layers great with my sunscreen and makeup. The cream leaves my skin looking so plump and glowy. It has a bit of a heavy fragrance at first but goes away after a couple minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful set that would make a good gift for those wanting to try out ELEMIS products.   My only issue with this set is that some of the products are heavily perfumed. I don't mind the scent, but do have very sensitive skin so would prefer unscented products. Otherwise, the set itself is great and the products feel very luxurious.

reviews.review_title: I really liked how clean my face felt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought there would be no way my face would feel clean after using these but I was left surprised. The hydrating cream really stretched. A little went along way. I also really liked the resurfacing pads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had mixed results with this kit, so I'm rating the products here separately.   My Skin: I am 42 years old with combination skin that's usually on the drier side. My pores clog easily, leading to breakouts, so heavy products tend not to work well for me (even though I need more hydration).  1. Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm - 2.5/5 Pleasant eucalyptus scent, but this cleanser was somewhat thicker/dry compared to other cleansing balms I've used. I had to use a lot of product to go over my entire face and I wasn't as happy with the results. Very visibly clogged pores, etc. I havent reached for it again, and probably would not purchase for myself.  2. Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads - 5/5 These are GOLD and I plan to purchase them. I have a very hard time finding toning products that aren't overly drying, but also clear out my pores. My face feels smooth and not parched after using. I would recommend giving these a try.  3. Pro-Collagen Marine Cream - 4/5 This is a very nice day cream, and I used the entire tube. I will say, the fragrance is pretty heavy and it lingers for a bit. It's not unpleasant, but also not my favorite. I've also noticed that my skin is a bit drier after straying from my regular brand for a week. I probably would not purchase for myself for this reason, though I still think its a good product. Skin feels plump and hydrated after use - I would just need to add more hydation if I used long term.  Overall I enjoyed trying out this kit, and would try more products from this brand. If you're new to Elemis, I'd recommend giving this kit a try. I received this kit in exchange for my unbiased review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the resurfacing pads and the collagen cream. There are both great products that left my skin feeling great. However, I am not a fan of the pro collagen cleansing balm. The texture is too oily and leaves residue behind.

reviews.review_text: After using these products for the past several weeks, I noticed a major difference in my skin. And so did my esthetician! The texture of my skin completely transformed after consistently using these pads for two straight weeks. The pro-collagen marine cream is light but effective in hydrating and creating a plumper, more youthful appearance over time. Elemis hit it out of the park with these products and I would definitely re-purchase each of these products!

reviews.review_text: 5 stars for the products! I love them all but wish the sizes were bigger for the price!   Received this product for free through influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to get my hands on this Collagen Health Starter Kit from Elemis London!  It was a great way for me to try out Elemis products and see how well they work for my skin.  The kit includes deluxe minis of the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm, Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads, and the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream, which is awesome because I am on the go a lot, so I do appreciate having items I love in sizes that fit in my makeup bag.  Iu2019ve always been about moisturizing and skin care because my mom always stressed the importance of it (& looks young for her age still).  But now that Iu2019ve hit my mid-40s (I swear I was 33 last week - not sure what happened), the collagen is a game changer and skincare is ever so important.  I loved everything in the box - the ball, the facial pads, and the moisturizing cream!  Itu2019s convinced me to try some other products from this brand and I definitely want to buy the marine cream in a larger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set. Thanks influencer for this complimentary sample. The cleansing balm smells amazing. I love lavender smell to it. The cleansing pads and the moisturizer is amazing. After this regimen my face was so glowy. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for 2 weeks, I didn't really notice any changes in the appearance of my skin. It might take longer than 2 weeks to see any results.  I can say that the cleansing balm smelt like menthol but it was not overwhelming.  The toning pads and face cream had a very subtle fresh scent that was nice. These products did leave my face feeling clean. My face did not break out and these products did not dry out or irritate my skin. I have normal skin not to oily and not to dry. My skin has never been sensitive so no problems for me. If I had seen a result I may have considered purchasing these products in full size but they are rather expensive and as I didn't notice any difference in my skin, I will not be purchasing these products in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Elemis Best Sellers Trio from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. This trio includes travel-sized versions of the Elemis cleansing balm, dynamic resurfacing pads, and pro collagen day cream.  While the dynamic resurfacing pads were new to me, I've been using the cleansing balm for months, preferring its original formula over the rose version. The balm efficiently removes makeup without the need for double cleansing, making it perfect for travel or lazy evenings. Its thick texture suits my skin year-round and has a pleasant, light scent.  The dynamic pads, housed in a convenient container, were properly hydrated and easy to use. They felt good on the skin and seemed to help with hormonal breakouts. I would be interested in purchasing this separately.   As for the day cream, this was my least favorite out of the three products. It is a nice product and I would use it again, but it irritates my cheeks and it doesnu2019t wear well with my sunscreen. I actually prefer to wear this at night because I find it too heavy to wear under makeup. I do like this product and would use it again, I just donu2019t absolutely love it.   The set is designed to last at least two weeks, with the dynamic pads lasting exactly that long if used daily. I still have half of the cleansing balm left and have found that this size jar can last me 1-3 months, depending on usage. Overall, I've been impressed with the products and would recommend the set for travel or as a gift, particularly for those interested in Elemis' pro collagen line. I am rating this five stars because in terms of a trial or travel set, I canu2019t really think of anything that would make it better. I personally would buy this set for when I travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Elemis in exchange for my honest review. This is an incentivized post.   Elemis is one of my favorite skin care brands, and I was so excited to check out this best sellers kit. I had used the pro-collagen cleansing balm before, and itu2019s one of my favorite cleansing balms. It has a really nice, thick texture that keeps my skin hydrated while getting rid of all my makeup. I can also use it to take off my eye makeup without any stinging, burning, or eye discomfort. It also smells so good, likely due to the rose and mimosa waxes present in the balm. The dynamic resurfacing facial pads provide a gentle exfoliation that doesnu2019t irritate the skin at all. I have oily skin that starts to look dull without regular exfoliation, and these immediately brighten the look of my skin. I really liked how one side was textured just to add a little bit more exfoliation to the gentle AHA thatu2019s already infused into the pads. Finally, the kit includes the pro-collagen marine cream. This cream is meant to help improve the appearance of wrinkles. I canu2019t really speak to that part, as I have young skin, but it did feel very moisturizing without clogging up my pores. I have acne-prone skin, but this cream didnu2019t cause any breakouts despite the fact that it feels very hydrating. This kit is perfect for a gift, for anyone new to Elemis who wants to try out their most popular products, or just for skin care lovers like me!

reviews.review_title: Great kit to get a feel for their products!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great kit to get to know their products. I liked all of them except for the cleansing balm. It felt way too heavy on my skin and it didn't feel like it helped cleanse at all. Definitely not for makeup removal. Though it left my skin soft, even after using the other products I could still feel it on me. All products were gentle & even with how heavy the balm was I didn't break out, which was a bit surprising to me. The resurfacing pads were a bit flimsy to rub on a circular motion and I'd probably like that product as a liquid I could use on my own cotton or cloth to apply. The marine cream smelled so nice and was light but there was so little of it in the bottle and when I finally was able to get some out, too much came out of it and you really only need a small amount to get the full benefit of it. If you'd like to try these products without buying the full ones 1st, I think this is an excellent kit to do so. The stars is based more on the products in this kit themselves and my experience with them. I'd give the resurfacing pads 4 stars, the marine cream 5 and the balm 2.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for awhile, I would rate it 4 stars. Although I haven't seen much change in my skin, I  still enjoy using the products.   This kit comes with three products, a cleansing balm, resurfacing pads, and a moisturizing cream. The balm and cream are nice and gentle, but I the resurfacing pads are a little much for my sensitive skin to use every day. The cleansing balm is great for taking off makeup, and I like the cooling effect of the cream.   Overall, I think the set is a little on the pricy side for the size of the products. However, they seem to work well together and are enjoyable to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a person with sensitive/dry mature skin, I am always looking for hydrating products which do not cause breakouts or reactions. The Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm is a new favourite! It removed my make up effortlessly and left me feeling hydrated. The Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads are also a dream. The light scent is pleasing, and while I certainly felt the exfoliation, it didnu2019t burn or leave my skin feeling raw. The Pro-Collagen Marine Cream is perfect for a light daytime moisturizer. While I do not feel, it would be the best under make up for my skin personally, I will definitely use it on no make up days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time ever using any skincare products and the Elemis starter kit did not disappoint. The cleansing balm has a light scent of eucalyptus and almond oil and it is silky smooth and left my skin feeling refreshed. It does have a slight tingle to it (which I didnu2019t mind) almost like an immediate firming of the skin. The facial pads have a light baby scent/clean linen they were also cooling which was an added bonus because they left my skin feeling rejuvenated. The pro-collagen cream has a very light scent and is light on the skin. Even though it is light on the skin, it left my skin feeling moisturized, which is needed for the cold winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this set. From the beginning I could feel a difference in the texture of my skin, as it made my face feel so soft! It didn't aggravate anything or cause acne (a pretty common occurrence for me), my pores shrank, and I noticed a brighter complexion. I stopped using the resurfacing pads and moisturizer because I ran out, and went back to my last routine, and unfortunately I noticed an immediate difference back in the wrong direction. I can't wait to get back to the whole routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange for my review. I really liked this set. The cleansing balm is a nice smooth consistency and spreads really nicely on the face. Itu2019s a great first step to remove makeup easily in a double cleanse routine. The resurfacing pads are awesome. I feel like this made such a huge difference in my texture over just the two weeks Iu2019ve been using it. In my attached picture I know the lifting isnu2019t exactly the same but you can see the big difference in my texture from the before pics on the left and the after pics on the right. The moisturizer is really nice as well. It smells fresh and is lightweight but still very moisturizing. I used it in the mornings, and it didnu2019t cause any problems under my makeup. I would recommend this kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I began using this line every night about two weeks ago and I am obsessed. The cleansing balm has a very light fresh scent. It doesn't dry out my skin like some other cleaners do, especially in the winter. I use the resurfacing pads after the cleanser, which are super easy and convenient. Lastly, I apply the cream moisturizer. It goes on extremely smooth and easy. The scent is great and light. My skin can get pretty dry in the winter months, but since I began using this Elemis regimen I can see and feel a difference. My face is brighter and so soft and smooth. I will definitely continue using these!

reviews.review_text: This line made my skin actually feel clean, moisturized and soft. My skin is typically dry in the winter but itu2019s stayed soft in between washes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Discovery Set for free from Influenster and Elemis in exchange for my honest review. This was my first time ever trying the brand Elemis and I am so impressed! The Elemis pro collagen cleansing balm was so good! It did smell a little strong with the scent but the scent smelled so good at the same time. You only need a little bit of product to remove a full face of makeup. It also feels really gentle on the skin. The Elemis Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads made my skin feel so nice and they also didnu2019t irritate my skin. There is no strong scent on this product which is great! The last item that came in the set was the pro collagen marine cream. This doesnu2019t have a strong scent either which I love! This was an amazing moisturizer! I loved it! I can be a bit picky with what skincare items I like but I can tell you that all three items were the best! My skin looks so clear and feels so smooth. My skin also looks so healthy. If you are looking for some good quality skincare definitely get this! I donu2019t purchase high end skincare that often but if I needed some I would buy these especially the marine cream itu2019s that good. Overall Iu2019m so grateful I was sent this set to try because I love trying out skincare and I loved that there were three products to try out. Sets are the best because you can try a couple of products from the brand. I highly recommend all three of these skincare items.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVEEE this kit. I love that it provides everything, the cleanser, the moisturizer and the facial pads. The facial pads are my favorite and itu2019s so hard to find a product like this nowadays.   I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_text: I have tried several cleansing balms but this been my favorite! It got all my makeup off with ease and made my skin feel so youthful . The Resurfacing Pads made my skin feel and look so smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple weeks, especially during this dry winter weather,  I am seeing a brightness and fullness to my skin. The resurfacing pads are awesome as well, really makes the skin smooth, no harsh scrubbing needed to see a clear difference.   I highly suggest getting this kit if you want to try some premium skin care

reviews.review_title: Good but no difference vs my normal routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free in return for my review.  Cleansing balm: takes some getting used to if you havenu2019t used a balm before (which I had not). But it is smooth and has a very nice u201cspa likeu201d fragrance.  Resurfacing pads: Iu2019m really not sure what value these provide. I wouldnu2019t purchase these individually.  Moisturizer: This is a nice moisturizer, and is not on the thick/heavy side. If you have really dry patches, you will likely need to supplement with a more heavy duty moisturizer.  Overall, this is a nice kit if youu2019re looking to try a new skin care routine. I donu2019t notice any difference after using this for 3 weeks vs my normal skin routine of LRP cleanser and moisturizer, which I am already happy with. Iu2019ll stick with my LRP due to cost and similar results, but worth a try if youu2019re unhappy with your current routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for free for my review.  I have used previously and love the cleansing balm, melts away makeup and conditions my aging skin.  The Resurfacing pads help exfoliate without being harsh.  I definately felt a boost of moisture, which is so important in winter.  The marine cream absorbed well, and have a perfect level of moisturization.  I do think this reduced my fine lines, and left my skin feeling more dewey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The resurfacing pads are also interesting but I wouldnu2019t use daily as my skin is a bit sensitive. I also like the cleansing balm but would take off your makeup first, then use the balm IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set is great! I love the mini selection it has ..the wipes make my skin feel great and fresh and the moisturizer has a lovely scent and is so moisturizing..the cleansing balm is a great product to make sure your skin is getting a great deep clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this kit from influencer. I was very excited to try it. As I already use eye cream + eye and lip make remover. I really wanted to save it for my next travel but couldnu2019t wait any longer. I used balm + pads in the evening and moisturizer in the morning. Sometimes I tried pads in the morning before I applied moisturizer. Cleansing balm - I know that Elenis ball has been viral but I personally was getting a feeling that I need to used another cleanser after not because it didnu2019t clean . Something about the formula and my oily skint felt strange. When wiping with pads , it washed off all the make up .Balm worked, pads were clean .  Pads gave me slight tingle , left my skin a little sticky . I didnu2019t like the feeling. Moisturizer was my favorite likened the smell , texture and how my skin felt after as I applied sunscreen + make up over. Overall great size when traveling.

reviews.review_title: It will definitely be part of your next purchases.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Elemis skincare kit exceeded all my expectations when it came to taking care of my combination skin. From the moment I tried the complete kit, I was pleasantly surprised by the effectiveness of each product. The Dynamic Resurfacing Pads were a game-changer, delivering a deep cleansing sensation that not only removed impurities but also left my skin texture noticeably smoother and revitalized. One of the standout products for me was the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm. Its luxurious texture made the cleansing process a true indulgence, and the results were remarkable. My skin felt firmer, more toned, and incredibly refreshed after each use. The gentle yet effective formula worked wonders in restoring my skin's natural balance and radiance. When it came to addressing deep wrinkles and maintaining optimal hydration, the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream proved to be a lifesaver. This rich cream provided the perfect solution for smoothing out stubborn wrinkles and keeping my skin hydrated without feeling greasy or heavy. The result was plump, supple skin that looked and felt rejuvenated. Beyond the visible results, the subtle scent of the Elemis products added an extra layer of luxury to my skincare routine. While I typically prefer stronger fragrances, the delicate aroma of these products provided a sense of prolonged cleanliness and relaxation that I truly appreciated.  I think it would also be a great gift to give to a loved one, the size could be a little bigger, but the packaging is perfect. Beautiful and attractive. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend the Elemis skincare line to anyone looking to achieve firmness, luminosity, and an overall pleasant sensory experience in their skincare routine. With a combination of effective formulas and luxurious textures, Elemis has truly elevated my skincare routine to new heights.

After using this product over the last few weeks I am loving how my skin looks and feels. My skin looks brighter and feels more firm. My dark circles arenu2019t as noticeable and neither are my blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved all the products in this kit!   The balm works amazing as a makeup remover but it is a bit thick- it takes a minute to rinse it off, but it does do a nice job and doesnu2019t feel greasy or oily.   The marine cream is LOVELY! It is a great daily moisturizer and makes my skin feel silky smooth.   The facial pads work well and have lots of product on each pad to cover your whole face! They are gentle yet effective.   Iu2019d recommend these to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Surprised at how much I like these!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have slightly sensitive combo skin so itu2019s hard for me to find products that work with me and this is amazing for me! I fell in love with the pro collagen marine cream in the 3 piece starter set I received from Elemis. I use it every morning and night. Itu2019s amazing under my makeup and keeps my skin hydrated and plump without breaking me out! The scent is also very nice, itu2019s refreshing. The cleansing balm is great for removing my makeup and buildup from the day before I wash my face, it has a different scent from the pro collagen marine cream, itu2019s a zingy lemon and ginger scent.  The last thing I tried was the resurfacing pads. These ones smell like peach candy! I like to use this one once a week when I do my skincare treatments as exfoliating can irritate my skin if I use it a lot. Out of all 3 my favorite would have to be the marine cream! Definitely going to have to repurchase. This is a great way to test these products before you buy the full size and would make an amazing gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin

But at the end of th bday, my face was still smooth.  It smelled good too. Which is a plus.

I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster and Elemis in exchange for my honest review. I used this kit every day for two weeks and I don't think it did much to improve my skin.   My face felt a little firmer but I didn't look any better and it made my pores look huge, which is a problem I haven't dealt with in the past.  The kit is nicely packaged, the lotion smells lovely and the cleansing balm smells like lavender.  I will finish the product but I won't buy it again.

reviews.review_title: The Marine Cream is a must have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the set for free from Influencer and Elemis in exchange for my honest review.  Pro Collagen Marine Cream: I have been using this product for over 3 years, and have even gifted it a few times. Itu2019s a staple in my routine, and notice a difference in my skin when I run out. I have sensitive skin and it can often react to new products. I have never had a negative reaction to any of the Elemis products. The cream is light, feels like silk on the skin, and absorbs quickly. It also layers beautifully under makeup. My skin looks more plump and youthful when using this. There is a slight spa like scent, but itu2019s only noticeable in the jar and not when applied.  Resurfacing Pads: I use these pads 3 to 4 times a week but, I think they are gentle enough to use daily. Skin texture isnu2019t a real issue for me, so I canu2019t speak on terms of that, but I do notice a glow after using them. Each pad is very saturated, so one can be used on the entire face.  Cleansing Balm: This is my least favorite product that I have tried from Elemis. It does a nice job of removing makeup, it is a  tad thick and it takes longer to rinse off with water. The skin is left hydrated and not greasy or oily. My personal preference is a cleansing oil with a pump. This is the most fragranced of their products.   Although I highly recommend this brand, especially the Pro-Collagen Marine Cream I would suggest skipping this set as they are tiny sample sizes and go for the full size, you wonu2019t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Elemis in exchange for my honest review. After using these 3 products for 2 weeks, I have noticed incredible results! I tend to have dry skin during the winter; these products have helped my skin feel very hydrated. The application of the cleansing balm goes smoothly, but removing makeup is effortless. The smell is amazing as well. The facial pads did sting at first use, but after a few days, my skin got accustomed to the formula. The day cream has been very hydrating. Overall, these products have improved the look of my pores, fine lines, and dryness and have given me glowing and softer skin. I highly recommend these products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin type is combination with an oily t-zone and dry spots. I found this set had my skin feeling smooth and hydrated but a bit of weight to it with use of the cleansing balm. It isnu2019t very sticky or greasy and it does feel good. My cheeks are sensitive and I had no issues with irritation. My favorite product is the wipes themselves, they cleanse well and feel great. The entire set has a refreshing and relaxing scent. I will continue to use this set and it would make a great gift, especially for those who suffer from normal to dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm extremely excited to be chosen to review this set. Not only because I'm a HUGE fan of the pro collagen cleansing balm which I've been using for a few years now, but now I have the opportunity to complete the treatment with steps 2 & 3.  Step 1 - I've tried SO many cleansing balms before, from the cheapest to a luxury brand and trust me, nothing beats Elemis. I'm not a huge fan of scented facial products but this balm is something else, light and calming - a spa-like scent. A little really goes a long way. It washes off really easy without leaving any residue- which is a huge differential from all the other cleansing balms I've ever tried. It does leave me a little dryness sensation around my nose when used individually, but nothing intolerable. It's great for removing make up without burning your eyes.  Step 2 - Great scent, though I wish it was scentless just because this is the type of product you don't typically use as a last step of your skincare routine. I love this is a very thin facial pad. It comes with the right amount of product without feeling you're using too much (or too little) of it. It has a very gentle exfoliating texture added to it. It adds luminosity, great for dark spots around the eyes and moisture after using the cleansing balm. I haven't used for 28 days yet to confirm it removes the dead cells and accelerate the skin's natural cell turnover, however, I can attest I really like the way things are going.  Step 3 - This is a day anti-wrinkle hydrating cream, so it's better if it's used as part of your morning routine. Lightweight, adds a very soft and hydrating layer on your skin.  It reminds me of a primer layer. This has the typical marine scent from any skincare product that contains such ingredient: fresh, calm, adding moisture with the intention of minimizing pores and skin. 100% approved.  Overall, I do recommend this set and it is a great option of a set since it contains a cleanser, an exfoliator and a moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved using the Elemis Collagen Health Starter Discovery set. The packaging is really nice and the products are so luxurious. The pro-collagen cleansing balm cleaned my skin and didn't strip it. It has a lemon scent. The resurfacing pads had a bumpy side and a smooth side and smelled like plum candy. I enjoyed using those. The marine cream had a nice floral scent and my skin drank that up. I normally use KBeauty and JBeauty products but Elemis is now on my radar. I think this would be a good set to take on a short vacation or give as a gift to a fellow skincare geek.

reviews.review_title: Adding to my daily skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As one who struggles with sensitive dry skin I have been looking for a product that wouldnu2019t dry my skin out more. After using this product for 2 weeks my skin felt refreshed and smooth. I will definitely be adding this to my daily skincare routine. The size of the products make it easy to take for overnight travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product exceeds my expectations.   The balm leaves my skin feeling very hydrated.  The pads exfoliate but are not rough with on my skin.   The cream leaves a thin layer and not too Much.  It leaves my skin hydrated and looking younger.   This will be a part of my new routine.   These products all have a pleasant light small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product came just in time for me to bring it on a trip! I absolutely love it! The ball works great for taking off makeup. I love the slight minty-ness but it was comfortable on my skin and cleansed very well. The pads were awesome, my skin texture improved from using it. The cleanser was also nice and lightweight. Out of the set I love the pads and cleansing balm the most. Definitely would purchase the full sized!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great starter kit for those wanting to try Elemis. The cleansing balm left my face feeling clean and almost too soft. The resurfacing pads made my skin soft and smooth the next morning. The cream has a clean scent, I only wish there was more of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard a lot of hype about Elemis from influencers, so I was excited to try these products. The cleansing balm has an earthy, herbal scent; almost spa like. I enjoyed using it, although, because it's a balm, it doesn't have the viscosity a cleansing oil does. I had to use a good bit of it to get a full face off. For this reason, I do not prefer balms. The next step was the Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads. These left my skin my red and I would not use again. Nothing explains what these are using to resurface, nor is there any guidance on how often to use. I looked at the ingredients and saw lactic acid. Any kind of exfoliator needs to have clear guidelines and disclosure on what it is you are putting on your skin. It was also heavily fragranced. The Pro-Collagen Marine Cream had a great texture but soo much fragrance. It was as though I was spraying perfume on my face. After trying these products, I think they are over-hyped and skin irritating to those who cannot tolerate synthetic fragrances in products. I would not purchase these in full size.

reviews.review_title: It is very hydrating and making your skin soft!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product for 2 weeks and it really hydrated my face. My face mostly dry skin and when you touch it it was rough now it is start feeling soft and very hydrated. I will recommend this product mostly for people struggling with dry skin. I love it and will buy more

reviews.review_title: My skin canu2019t live without it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best starter set for your face. The cleansing balm truly deep cleanses my face. I apply a little bit on my wet face. I follow it up with the pro collagen face cream. reviews.review_title: Must have for a daily skin care routine

reviews.review_text: After using this product for a weeks i have to say that my skin has improved tremendously. I have so much more moisture and glow to my skin. I will definitely be continuing this as my daily routine.

reviews.review_title: I will definitely continue to use this kit!

reviews.review_text: I recieved this kit as an incentive for an honest review through Influenster. After first use, my skin smelled and felt lovely. It was very smooth, moisturized and bright looking! Directions for the cleanser were not easily accessible on tub so that's eh. I do like the packaging of the products- it is simple and clean. You need to use a good amount of product for the cleanser, but the moisturizer isn't too bad.  I have slightly textured skin and it was SUPER smooth and soft throughout the day after using these products. I also have fairly dry, sensitive skin with redness and these products are all gentle enough to not cause any irritation. You can really feel it working and removing dead skin! I will definitely continue to use these products in my skincare routine and I would recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, these products smell amazing! It left my face feeling smooth, moisturized, bright and clean! I love the cleansing balm. It was unlike any cleaner I have used before. I love that all I had to do was apply it to my face without needing to wet my face first. It was non-irritating and left my face feeling cleansed and moisturized. The second step was the exfoliating pads which also smelled amazing. The pads were thin but effective. It was easy to use and I could feel a coolness to my face after applying. The final step was the moisturizer which you definitely do not need a lot of. It left my face feeling smooth and shiny. I loved using this entire kit and will definitely use it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried these products as part of program and I do really like the face program and the facial pads. I donu2019t overly love the makeup removing balm, I donu2019t feel that it works better than micellar water but I will keep giving it a chance.

reviews.review_title: Good to try but not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good set of Elemis products for trying out or for travel. My favorite product was the cleansing balm. It removed my makeup and stubborn mineral sunscreen well, although it doesnu2019t have as much slip as I prefer. Initially, I really liked the resurfacing pads. Because I have sensitive skin, I used them only twice a week at night and the next day my skin was be soft and smooth. Unfortunately, after 2 weeks, my skin became irritated and was breaking out much worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleansing balm:  The packaging of the jar was nice. It didn't feel cheap. It smells very nice- not too strong, but light. The amount in the kit I feel like will last a very long time. I use about a big pea size amount and a little goes a long way. I use it every morning. The texture is smooth and silky. I love that you can use it to wash your face or also as a mask. It didn't irritate my skin at all. After I used it my face has never felt softer. This one was my 2nd favorite in the kit.   Marine cream:  The size in this kit is very small. I feel like it's not enough product to get a good feel for the anti wrinkle part of it. I didn't really see a difference in the way my skin looked after using it. There is a slight smell to it, but it's not very strong. My skin didn't really react to it in a bad way. The consistency is your typical face lotion. After using it my skin felt very hydrated, smooth, and extremely soft. This was my favorite thing in this kit, I just wish the product size was bigger to test if it was actually anti wrinkle.   Facial pads:  The packaging was nice and basic. In this kit you get a good amount to try out. They come very soaked with product, which is nice. They have a very light clean sent. Super easy to use. I don't think my skin liked these very much. After using them my skin felt red and irritated. I though I needed to be more gentle when using them, but that didn't help any. I wouldn't really say that I have sensitive skin, so if you do this might not be a product you'd want to try. This was my least favorite out of all three.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this trip set! The cleanser is amazing for washing off the face and eye makeup right off your skin! No aggressive rubbing is necessary, which is love! I have used the pads from different companies before and I love these ones so much! The finish it off the Elemis moisturizer is amazing! I really feel like it has helped with my fine lines on my forehead and around my eyes. I use it every morning and you can definitely feel the tightening features of the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest feedback. I was so happy to be gifted this set as I struggle to find good skincare products. The cleansing balm is so hydrating and feels great on the skin. I have sensitive skin and have had no issues. It takes my makeup off with ease. No harsh scrubbing like you have to do with other makeup remover products. I have been using the toner pads most evenings after washing, and they make my face feel clean and refreshed after a long day. One pad is enough for entire face and neck! I didnu2019t think I would love the marine cream as much as I do! It smells like luxury in a bottle and it absorbs so well into the skin. The SPF does not have a white cast and this does not burn my face. Overall, I am very pleased with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with Elemis skincare set; what a perfect way to get started on your way to a healthy and glowing face! I love the Pro-Collagen Cleansing balm, It washed away all of my makeup, leaving my skin very soft and refreshed, the smell is light and fresh also. I liked that I only had to use a small amout of balm to get the job done. I enjoyed the the dynamic resurfacing facial pads, I first noticed how smooth my face looked and how my pores were smaller in appearance. I liked how the pads felt texture wise, they are exfoliating yet soft. Best of all is Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine day cream! I noticed that my wrinkles were minimized, and I felt like my skin was soft and hydrated all day. I like the light consistency of this cream too, my face loves it.  I used Elemis products for a week, and could noticeably see a difference in the overall appearance and health of my skin, my face is truly glowing! I highly recommend Elemis skincare set to my family, friends and just anyone wanting healthier skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal aging skin with some texture issues. I have been using this kit for 2 weeks and have noticed a slight improvement in my pores and texture. My favorite products are the pads and the moisturizer. My skin feels super clean and soft after use and throughout the day. I will continue to use these products and recommend them. The kit would also make a great gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a couple of weeks. These products feel so high end! This set comes with cleansing balm, textured resurfacing pads, and moisturizer. I implemented these products and loved them so much! High end feel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Elemis in exchange of my honest opinion. I received the cleanser, scrub pad and the moisturizer. From all of the three products the one I liked the most was the cleanser. It has a light smell which was great. I feels it moisturizer my skin while cleaning my face. It doesnu2019t a great job removing my make up. The pd was my least favorite. It does the job n removed any left over dirt on my skin. I just would like it to be more moist or creamer. The moisturizer is good. It hydrated my skin and it had a light scent as well. It was not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was amazed at how much I loved this best sellers kit. The cleansing balm is so fresh and lighter than it looks. It melts onto your skin and makes your face feel so clean and moisturized. I generally have dry and red facial skin in the winter, and these products have tackled that problem. The scent is so soothing and reminds me of my favorite essential oils. I would definitely recommend Elemis for a clean and soft yet moisturized face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this skincare kit for two weeks, and I have more positive than negative feedback to give. First, the bad news. The cleansing balm had an off-putting chemical smell each time I opened the jar. It faded once I applied it to my face, but if you have sensitive skin, please use caution. Also with the cleansing balm, I felt like I had to use quite a bit of product to fully coat my face and neck. Now onto the good news. First, these products felt very luxurious and were lovely to use. This goes double for the moisturizer (my favorite of the trio). I have dry combination skin and typically use a hyaluronic acid serum to help with hydration, but I didnu2019t need to use a serum while testing these products. The cleansing balm and moisturizer had very nice textures, and the facial pads kept their moisture throughout the two weeks. Overall, I think this kit is a great way to test out the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I actually didnu2019t realize what a difference this was making to my skin until I put these two pictures together. I knew my skin was softer, but I didnu2019t realize the change in wrinkles and texture until I looked at this side-by-side. I do think Iu2019ll keep using this because it was a solid change and wasnu2019t hard to accomplish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin felt so hydrated using the products. You can tell Elemis uses high quality ingredients in their products. I would recommend to family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The trio sampler is a great choice to try out the products before committing to a bigger size. The facial pads were really nice and made my skin feel soft and clean. The cleansing balm is really good at getting my makeup off and makes my skin feel refreshed after using. The cream is lightweight and left my skin feeling plump and glowy. All in all, would recommend these Elemis products and left my skin feeling great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thereu2019s nothing wrong with these products, I just have had more success with other Elemis products like their ginseng toner, but none of these were spectacular. They all smell and feel luxurious, so if fragrance is something your skin cannot handle (I personally have no issue) then this brand isnu2019t for you. The only thing Iu2019d maybe repurchase is the exfoliating pads, most chemical exfoliation pads or toners burn and irritate and make my skin red, but this didnu2019t. Other than that item, nothing was spectacular and there was nothing else I would repurchase. Itu2019s not bad, but for the price point of this brand itu2019s not spectacular

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A great easy 3 step skin care routine that is simple enough to stick to! These products have my skin feeling clean and rejuvinated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great value set and I loved everything in it! My favorite is the cleansing balm, which absolutely melted off my makeup. It also works great for double-cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for an effective skin care routine, and I am so glad I found this set.  It is easy to incorporate into my routine, and I noticed immediate results in the texture of my skin.  It is smooth without greasy.  I received this as part of a promotion, but already paid to replace each product to continue my use.

reviews.review_title: Must have skincare products for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to have pretty dry skin especially in the winter time so having a product to help hydrate my skin is a must have. ELEMIS skincare kit is a three step process. First up is a cleansing balm it smells really good and an excellent job at removing any leftover makeup. Then comes the Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads, they are little exfoliating pads that are not super abrasive where it tears skin off or stings. The comes the Pro Collagen Marine Cream for the hydration boost it goes on silky smooth and leaves skin feeling quenched but not greasy or oily. This is a product I definitely will be using regularly in my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is perfect for double cleansing. The cleansing balm works well paired with a simple cleanser. I love the facial pads for exfoliation, they leave my skin feeling so clean! I love the moisturizer, it leaves my skin feeling glowy and has anti-aging effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually have normal type skin but this winter I had a few dry patches that tended to cause me to break out. And OMG, those Dynamic resurfacing pads did the trick. I'm sure it was a combination of using the cleansing balm and the cream but those pads were my favorite. My skin is smoother and so soft. Will definitely be replacing my usual products with these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping this trio would up my skincare routine, but sadly, it fell short. The cleansing balm was strongly scented and not In a good way. You still need something to clean your eye make up separately as you can't get this anywhere near your eyes. It has a strong scent and I did not find it appealing. Following with the pads which are also of a strong scent and lastly the lotion which was fine. I thought my skin after two weeks of solid use was ruddy, red and seemed dryer they my normal routine. It may work for some, but it wasn't for me unfortunately! I will say om a positive note my skin did remain smooth to the touch and no breakouts occurred so there were no negative reactions! Maybe I just need to continue use to see the positive benefits and will update if there is added improvements.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i loved this kit! the face pads were so refreshing and really did my face justice! the cleansing balm & the lotion left my face so smooth and clear. i will 100% buy this again and plan on it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the exfoliating pads and the cleansing balm and the balm removed  my makeup easily without dragging my skin not making it feel weird. The pads are amazing to exfoliate your skin gently, however, the lotion are things I wouldnu2019t care about. They are very scented and will defiantly make sensitive skin break out

reviews.review_title: Makes skin so smooth and plump!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A must-have for healthy glowing skin! I received this to try complimentary and absolutely fell in love! The smooth buttery face wash was totally different than I've ever used. It melts away the makeup so easily! My favorite was the pads. My skin was so plump and smooth after using them. The cream with collagen smells heavenly. You should definitely try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this kit is awesome! I love the cleanser. I love the texture of it. The exfoliating pads are so interesting! They work really well. The moisturizer is also great. Overall itu2019s a great kit for someone who wants a soft face. Iu2019d recommend for anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this discovery set as an incentivize giftu2026 But let me tell you i am obsessed!! This makes my skin feel so useful and bouncy! I am traveling, and it is the perfect size to bring with me without compromising my skin care routine. I highly recommend. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the facial pads were great for my combination skin to make it smooth again. my favorite product was the cleaning balm that i used to remove my makeup with. the anti wrinkle cream was great for keeping my skin hydrated! this would be a great gift for family/friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenter in exchange for my honest review and omg my skin has honestly never felt any better. I decided to wait and give this a try for a week straight before I decided to post. Will be buying more!
