reviews.review_title: Great kit to try the system. My face is so soft!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this kit for 2 weeks and wow my skin has never been clearer or softer. It was my first time trying a cleansing balm- I loved it so much! This one has a lemon balm scent and removed my waterproof makeup easily. The resurfacing pads made my face so soft. The lotion was the last step and felt light and absorbed in quickly. I loved this kit and wamt to buy more cleansing balm and resurfacing pads!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried the products for two weeks now. The set includes a cleansing balm , dynamic resurfacing facial pads and anti-wrinkle hydrating cream. This is a good sample  size to get a feel for the products.I have tried the cleansing balm before and it does a good job for first cleanse and doesnu2019t irritate my eyes. The facial pads are ok. My favorite part was the pro-collagen anti wrinkle cream, it absorbed well on the skin and looked good under makeup. I felt my skin felt soft after use. I will be purchasing a full size of the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this kit for a couple of weeks and so far I really like it. The cleansing balm is great for taking off makeup and cleaning your skin I like itu2019s not too scented. The pads exfoliated well and didnu2019t sting my face . The moisturizer really made my face hydrated as well. Overall I really enjoyed the products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the complimentary ELEMIS Skincare VoxBox for testing purposes. Iu2019ve been using this kit for a week now and I can see a difference in my skin. My skin looks firmer and is more evenly moisturized and radiant and feels very smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this by Influenster in exchange for my honest review! I enjoyed the set as a combination. My skin felt clean and refreshed. The Pro-collagen day time hydration was my favorite thing out of this trio! My skin did not feel dry all day. Even at the end of the day it was still feeling soft. I do think the cleansing balm is to greasy for my combination style skin. I opted out of using it after the 4th time as I did not like the feeling at all. I think the packaging is very clean and aesthitcally pleasing. It is also priced competively with other skincare sets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I was really excited about these products. The resurfacing pads help a lot with areas that need extra exfoliating and the moisturizer left my skin feeling hydrated and smooth. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: Easy three step process for great skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the three products! The resurfacing pads are slightly rough to smooth skin, but not irritating. Kind of feels like a buffer. The cleaning balm initially feels oily, but it removes make up gently and doesnu2019t leave your skin feeling dry after it washes off. The cream is light and feels great in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good set! I love the moisturizer. The cleanser is also good. It leaves your face smooth and did not dry it out. The pads are okay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using this trio helped my skin stay hydrated and clean even when my skin barrier was compromised. It didn't sting or burn. I do recommend using the balm in a double cleanse. The moisturizer is clean smelling and adds visible hydration. The balm is excessively fragrant so if you're sensitive to that beware.

reviews.review_title: Good trio to try Elemis products or travel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great trio to try out. My favorite was the cleansing balm which smells like a luxurious spa and is a thick, creamy texture. It dissolves all my makeup no problem. The lotion is light and absorbs easily, and the pads are very well saturated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who uses Elemis products in my daily skincare routine, I was excited to try this! The set is a great price for the value and quality of the products. My favorite product in the set is the facial pads. The fragrance is not too strong and I feel like they made my skin smoother over the time I have used them. Adding these products into my routine has been seamless, as I do the pads before applying my Elemis toner and after using my Elemis facial cleanser. I keep all of my facial products and serums in a skincare fridge for the best results. I canu2019t wait to try even more Elemis products in the future! I highly suggest getting this kit if you want to try some out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this kit! The cleansing balm is wonderful and doesnu2019t leave a greasy film, which I love! The facial pads are great and not too overpowering for my somewhat sensitive skin. The marine cream is amazing and a little goes a long way. After using this kit my skin has been noticeably softer and brighter. I highly recommend this kit as the products work so well together!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this kit for 2 weeks now. I have combination skin, leaning dry during these colder winter months. I typically use a similar system, but I've noticed my normal system hasn't been hydrating enough for my winter dryness. The Elemis kit has been able to combat my dry skin amazingly. I love how moisturizing the cleansing balm is, it's gentle and smells great. After I use the balm, I use the resurfacing pads which are gentle enough for me, but they do gently exfoliate the dryness away. My favorite is the moisturizing cream. It smells great and is super hydrating. My face looks glowy and smooth after applying, and my makeup goes on well over it. I was breaking out before starting this kit, and within days, my breakouts were clear!! I will continue using this and will purchase full size products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.  The cleanser is amazing ud83dudc4fud83cudffd ud83dude0d...makes your skin super smooth and retain moisture.  The resurfacing pads are awesome as well. Really smoothes your skin out, and you can feel and see a difference.  Moisturizer is okay. I think it should be a little heavier. However, using it without the cleanser does make a difference. I've used it both with the cleanser and without. Definitely works better using all three steps together.

reviews.review_title: Left my Skin Feeling SO Soft
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is combo right now due to pregnancy and these products seem to do well with my current skin type. I saw a few people mention that the cleansing balm made their skin feel oily, but I didnu2019t think it did. It seemed to rinse off well and got all my makeup off. I also enjoyed the botanical scent of it. If it did leave any residual oiliness on my face, the wipes would remove it. I was worried the wipes would leave my skin feeling dry, but they surprisingly didnu2019t. My favorite product of all 3 was definitely the moisturizer. It left my skin feeling SO soft and radiant and had a very subtle, enjoyable scent. It also didnu2019t cause any breakouts, which I was nervous about. I will probably end up purchasing the moisturizer because I like it so much. This would be a great gift for a skin care junkie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Clean and fresh smelling products. Lotion is great for dry skin, cleansing product works well for taking off makeup and mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What a perfect starter set. The balm melts away eye makeup with no problems. No harsh scrubbing. The resurfacing pads leaves my skin feeling clean and bright. My favorite step is the marine cream. It smells amazing. It leaves my skin soft and supple.  The marine cream soaks into my skin so quickly. I love it. Iu2019ll be purchasing this over and over

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this set from Influenster complimentary, in exchange for a review. I am really enjoying using it. The exfoliating wipes makes my skin feel so refreshed. The cleansing balm really does a good job cleaning my face, and the anti-aging cream feels and smells amazing. I have been using it for almost a week, and would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised by these products. I have combination skin. The cleansing balm is not my favorite. I would prefer a face wash that suds when I put it on. This is like putting a moisturizer on. The toner pads and moisturizer are my favorite. They have a slight fragrance so you may not like it if you donu2019t like products with fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Very hydrating! Dry skin be gone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 44yr old female with oily skin that can get dry in areas occasionally. After using this product for a couple weeks, I am pleased with what I am seeing. The cleansing balm threw me off a bit as it feels like a vaseline. With how pricey this product is, that made me a bit crazy as it would get under my nails and felt wasteful. There is a strong smell that lingers but it was pleasant so it didn't bother me. I was skeptical that I would see results in such a short time but I can honestly say I am seeing a brightness and fullness to my skin. Additionally when I first started I had some nasty dry spots due to over zealous retin-a use and the moisturizer quickly took care of that, faster than any other product in my arsenal. I would love to continue using this product as I feel it does what it promises.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product from Elemis and Influenster for free in exchange for an honest review.  Been using this kit for the past 1-2 weeks.  The cleansing balm has a relaxing scent which I like. It needs to be applied onto dry skin and then massage and rinse. I like it since itu2019s not over-drying after I use it.   The exfoliating pads are next after using the cleansing balm. It also has a slight scent to it which I donu2019t mind. It does help to clean and exfoliate the skin, but itu2019s probably not for those with sensitive skin since it kind of stings after using it. I did feel a little tingling on my face but was fine after few seconds. Probably best to use once every 2 days or so.   The moisturizer was alright, not the best. It doesnu2019t feel super hydrating but it does the job. Probably not the best moisturizer for those with dry skin. I have normal skin but I had to use another moisturizer on top of it because it just didnu2019t feel hydrating enough. On top of that, the scent was very strong for me personally. It would be great if there wasnu2019t any fragrance at all!   Overall I would give a 3 stars because for the price, thereu2019s something better. Also stars taken off due to the fragrance in all 3 products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the exfoliating wipes and the collagen face cream but the wash makes my fave feel greasy even after using the wipes!! Will continue to use till the product is gone to make sure it isnu2019t just cleaning up my skin from other products

reviews.review_title: A must have for dry skin gals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend to everyone who has dry skin! Iu2019ve tried tatcha and it did not work as great as Elemis! After one use of the cream, I felt such a huge change in my skin barrier. Love the 3 easy steps! This has made me change over to Elemis!

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of the cleansing balm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cleansing balm is a little too greasy for my oily acne-prone skin. I feel the need to wash it off with a face-wash as opposed to the instructions that say to wipe it off with a damp cloth. But I really like the marine cream. It is light weight and my skin soaks it up and doesnu2019t feel oily after. It says itu2019s a day cream but I have used it at night and love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed all of these products, but my favorites are the Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads and Pro-Collagen Marine Cream. The Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm gave me small breakout (not allergic type but small pimples), but I have tired other brand's cleansing balms and I have the same reaction. The balm smells SO nice though (lavender and slightly citrus).  There is a noticeable healthy glow to my skin immediately after using, and it continues to remain so after 2 weeks of use. The pads are a gentle exfoliation, and although my skin is red in the photos, my skin naturally has redness. It's not from the pads. You can see some of the glow on my forehead.  I got this in exchange for my review, but I will be purchasing the resurfacing pads again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for a review. I have tried this product for a week now and I am really enjoying it. It does not leave my skin feeling oily or heavy. It has a nice scent and I have noticed my skin looking more vibrant. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set had a good selection of products and each one seemed to be effective and useful. The best in the trio was the cleansing balm, which felt like it did a good job of removing makeup. The exfoliating pads seemed to be effective and did not make my skin break out as some exfoliaters do. However, the pro-collagen marine cream left my skin feeling a bit greasy. As someone with skin on the oily side, I felt that this was not the best moisturizer for me, especially for use during the day. I may switch to using it at night instead and see if it leaves the same greasy feeling. Overall I feel like this was a good way to get to try the Elemis brand for the first time and I will definitely consider their products the next time I'm looking for something new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it has 3 things the exfoliate pads are perfect your feel clean your skin and the cleanse are super soft and the hydrate cream gives a soft touch for your skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Used for two days and immediately broke out with acne. The perfume smells are SOOO strong. My forehead got a minor rash that subsided overnight thank god. I would never recommend this set.
